Name: Standard input
Description: The default data stream for input, for example in a command pipeline. In the terminal, this defaults to keyboard input from the user.

Name: Standard output
Description: The default data stream for output, for example when a command prints text. In the terminal, this defaults to the user's screen.

Name: Standard error
Description: The default data stream for output that relates to an error occurring. In the terminal, this defaults to the user's screen.
